Detailed Description

cvmx_bgx::_cmr::_config

Logical MAC/PCS configuration registers; one per LMAC. The maximum number of LMACs (and maximum LMAC ID) that can be enabled by these registers is limited by BGX()_CMR_RX_LMACS[LMACS] and BGX()_CMR_TX_LMACS[LMACS]. When multiple LMACs are enabled, they must be configured with the same [LMAC_TYPE] value.
